name: stunningly
content:
stunningly adverb
(BEAUTIFUL)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is extremely beautiful or attractive: a stunningly beautiful/attractive woman It is stunningly gorgeous in eastern Congo. "Masai" was shot, absolutely stunningly, by Manuel Teran.
More examplesFewer examplesI think she's stunningly beautiful.The countryside around here is stunningly beautiful.A stunningly attractive young man approached me.I was surrounded by stunningly sexy men.

stunningly adverb
(SURPRISING)
in a way that is very shocking or impressive: He's stunningly naive for a person of his age. Stunningly, she won in a landslide victory.
